## Modules 

The following Modules (Chapters) are suggested for the course - 


01. Chapter # 01 - Introduction to Machine Learning (ML) & Concepts 


02. Chapter # 02 - Introduction to `R` and `Python` and Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA)


03. Chapter # 03 - KNN Algorithm and Fundamental Concepts in ML Modeling 

04. Chapter # 04 - Logistic Regression Algorithm 

05. Chapter # 05 - Discriminant Analysis

06. Chapter # 06 - Naive Bayes and Support Vector Machine (SVM)

07. Chapter # 07 - Linear Regression 

08. Chapter # 08 - Decision Tree Analysis 

09. Chapter # 09 - Dimension Reduction and Principal Component Analysis 

10. Chapter # 10 - K- Means Clustering
